knimeNode.name: PMML Fragment Combiner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Combines two PMML preprocessing port objects into one.

fullDescription.intro: Combines two PMML preprocessing port objects into one. This node collects different preprocessing operations (such as normalization, outlier handling, discretization) into one output object. The output of this node can be used in a PMML integrator to inject the preprorcessing operatins into a final PMML model.
